author: stas
msg: check SvPOK before coercing the returned value into PV, to avoid undef

author: stas
msg: perl 5.6.x with -Duseperlio works with PerlIO*, not FILE*. prevent
incompatible type compilation warnings, by using the right type based on
whether perlio is enabled or not

author: stas
msg: prevent "Unquoted string "threads" may clash with future reserved word at"
warnings with 5.6.x which doesn't have the module threads.pm
